title: Inside Jennifer Lawrence's lavish boozy wedding to Cooke Maroney this weekend
text:

Jennifer Lawrence's wedding this Saturday is set to be a food and booze-stuffed affair as she and Cooke Maroney tie the knot eight months after getting engaged.

The 29-year-old Hollywood actress will marry her art dealer beau in front of 150 of their closest family and friends on Saturday, at a lavish ceremony in Rhode Island, US.

And their wedding will take inspiration from the season, with trays groaning under the weight of autumnal treats being offered up to the guests.

According to TMZ , the happy couple have enlisted the help of celebrity wedding planner Mark Seed, who operates in near-secrecy for his high-profile clients.

(Image: Elder Ordonez / SplashNews.com)

So private is his way of organising events that even his website is only available to view once you've booked an appointment with him to see his portfolio.

Mark has been coordinating the luxurious food and drink that the guests will be treated to on Saturday, including hors d'oeuvres to start them off.

Wait staff will offer up sweet potato flat cakes, brussels sprouts with cured egg yolk, smoked pork belly with pickled apple, and salt cod beignets (like doughnuts but savoury).

Once the guests are seated, they'll be treated to main courses of either wood-roasted fish with herbs and lemon-infused butter, or leg of five-week-aged beef with forager's sauce - very seasonal.

(Image: PA)

There's also smoked new potatoes, whey-braised cabbage and roasted heirloom carrots to wow their tastebuds.

The happy couple have picked out their favourite desserts to serve at the reception, too, with guests given the option of a fire-baked bread pudding with chocolate, salted caramel and fresh apple, sweet cauldron fritters with bourbon cream and cinnamon sugar, or marshmallow s'mores that they can roast themselves.

There's literally no way anyone will be able to stand up and dance over that feast, but they might just about find room for a glass or five of the couple's custom-designed cocktails - a bourbon Old Fashioned or gin cucumber lavender champagne.

However, Jen and Cooke seem to have taken the somewhat bizarre decision to only serve booze at a cash bar.

The pair have been trying to keep the details of their big day under wraps, but were spotted last month registering their intention to marry at the New York City Marriage Bureau.

(Image: Sourced from Instagram)

(Image: Sourced from Instagram)

"Jennifer and Cooke were at the weddings bureau together on the morning of September 16," a source told Us Weekly.

"They had a female friend and a photographer with them the entire time. They sat in the couches to the left and were trying to remain unseen."

But that didn't stop Jen from sharing her Amazon wishlist with fans, featuring delights such as a marble cheese slicer (natch), an aroma diffuser and a wooden salad bowl.

"Planning a wedding is so exciting, but it can be overwhelming," she wrote on the page.

"For anyone else needing a little inspiration, I thought it would be fun to collaborate with Amazon to share a few of my favorite registry wish-list items.

'It's so easy, and you can find everything you need all in one place."

(Image: Twitter/Elizabeth Lauren)

(Image: Twitter)

She and Cooke got engaged in February, having met in May 2018 through their mutual friend Laura Simpson.

J-Law was spotted wearing her low-key engagement ring in New York earlier this year, where she and Adele enjoyed a wild hen do surrounded by drag queens in the East Village.

Lightweight Jen even ended up peeing in a bucket rather than risk walking up a flight of steps to the toilet.

Alan Cumming, who runs the Club Cumming venue in the city, revealed what happened when the famous besties rolled in for Jen's secret hen do.

"We had a hilarious time where Jennifer Lawrence and Adele came," the actor told People Now .

"They went downstairs to the basement and Jennifer got her makeup done by the drag queens.

"And she peed in a bucket because she didn't want to go all the way back upstairs! Adele was there going, 'she's the face of Chanel!'" he laughed.
description: Hollywood star Jennifer Lawrence is marrying her fiance of eight months Cooke Maroney this Saturday in a beautiful autumnal wedding
